URL: http://www.forandagainst.com/The_Us_Army_Sucks
Crawl date: 2016/09/28 06:35:18
Title: The Us Army Sucks! - For & Against
Number of arguments: 7

Claim: The Us Army Sucks! - For & Against
For: Definatly they have the best kit in the world but they are just all regular troops none of them are very good and they also have loads of men
For: I know someone who is getting a brand new nice ass car for joining. Guess who's paying for that car and its gas. Taxpayers.
For: They should not interveine in other nations problems either
Against: My uncle's in the army, and he doesn't suck. He just tells me to put some pants on.
Against: Define: SUcks....how loose for an argument. And weak for a statement. The US Army is well-trained and creates many job opportunities for individuals to seek; from technical jobs to war oriented jobs the US Army has expanded its training and fiscal allowance over the past 18 years! You cannot say that they suck when their out-fits with standed and defeated that of Sadam Hussein's!
Against: Well, it doesn't TOTALLY suck, and it does have powerful weapons, like powerful bombs and such. As said earlier, they took down Osama Bin Laden, and the US army is probably better than lots of other countries...
Against: I think Osama bin Laden would disagree about the effectiveness of the U.S. Military ( if he were alive to tell about it ).
MetaData.Title: The Us Army Sucks!

Premise: I think Osama bin Laden would disagree about the effectiveness of the U.S. Military ( if he were alive to tell about it ).

Well, it doesn't TOTALLY suck, and it does have powerful weapons, like powerful bombs and such. As said earlier, they took down Osama Bin Laden, and the US army is probably better than lots of other countries...

Define: SUcks....how loose for an argument. And weak for a statement. The US Army is well-trained and creates many job opportunities for individuals to seek; from technical jobs to war oriented jobs the US Army has expanded its training and fiscal allowance over the past 18 years! You cannot say that they suck when their out-fits with standed and defeated that of Sadam Hussein's!
My uncle's in the army, and he doesn't suck. He just tells me to put some pants on.
They should not interveine in other nations problems either
I know someone who is getting a brand new nice ass car for joining. Guess who's paying for that car and its gas. Taxpayers.
Definatly they have the best kit in the world but they are just all regular troops none of them are very good and they also have loads of men
